name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mode = #{mode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

deleting != 1
and name like CONCAT('%', #{search,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')

deleting != 1
and name like CONCAT('%', #{search,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
